data.actual_result: When you press back, keyboard hides along with vc bar which reappears if you go to settings and press back again.
data.expected_result: When you press back, keyboard hides and vc bar is still visible.
data.short_description: VC bar at the bottom disappears while in split screen (Discord being in the lower half).
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a vc - Minimize Discord and open another app which supports split screen (YouTube in my case) - Tap and hold recent apps bar to trigger split screen and keep Discord in the lower half (occupying around 50% of the screen or less) - Go to any server text channel while you can still see the vc bar. Tap on the text field to pop up the keyboard (GBoard in my case) - Press back to hide the keyboard
